name: multiethnic
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
involving people of several different ethnicities (= groups of people with a shared culture, tradition, language, history, etc.): multiethnic society I enjoy living in a multiethnic society that is home to people of many different origins. His restaurant is in the middle of a vibrant multiethnic neighbourhood. Diplomats say such a move could lead to the collapse of the multi-ethnic country that was created by the peace accord.
having parents, grandparents, or great-grandparents of different ethnicities : They may have a different opinion about this, particularly if they are from a multiethnic family. He's from a multiethnic background.
More examplesFewer examplesThe city has a large multiethnic population.Social unity can be difficult to create in a multiethnic state.
Related word
ethnic
